snippet.title: Gartic Phone | The Telephone Game (How to play)
snippet.description:
Gartic Phone  brings to the web the experience of the traditional Telephone game
PLAY NOW!
https://www.garticphone.com
Join your friends in rounds of creating and describing drawings and sentences made by the players. The challenge is to keep the meaning of the drawings from the start to the end, but we're sure that it's gonna turn to a mess and you're gonna have fun and laugh a lot in the process.
